CustomField.description: User Id of the Kafka Integration User. If populated it is used to assign ownership of new records created by the integration when message operations are initiated by users other than the Integration User, e.g. by updating a record's "Reprocess Message" field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Id of the Kafka Integration User. Used to assign ownership of new records created by the integration when message operations are initiated by users other than the Integration User, e.g. by updating a record's "Reprocess Message" field
CustomField.label: Integration User Id
